org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.multicast
Class MulticastAdvertise

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModelAdapter
      org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.AdvertiseBase
          org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap.multicast.MulticastAdvertise
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, GenericStateModel
public class MulticastAdvertise
extends AdvertiseBase

This component advertises bundles by listening for UDP multicast requests and replying by UDP.

It looks in the ConfigService for config entries of type "-MULTICAST_REG" and scheme "multicast", or "-MCAST_REG" and "mcast", e.g.

   X={-MULTICAST_REG=multicast://224.22.165.34:7777}
and creates a UDP multicast listener for that group:port and replies to
   (Cougaar-ARP reply-to=HOST:PORT)
requests with text-encoded bundles tracked by the AdvertiseService (i.e. locally bound leases), e.g.
   (Cougaar-RARP from=test.com:9876 bundles:\
     A={-RMI=rmi://host:port/objId,\
   }\
   #)

Note that there's currently no filtering of the local leases.
